column2: A single national identity has emerged from the lands once walked by Muhammed. A true union of culture, religion and now rulership.

At the mere age of 15, $MONARCH$ has taken his father's position as head of the Shiite Turkmen tribe. He has quickly established a base of power in the northwest and proclaimed himself Shah of Iran. Several of the neighbouring regions have been conquered and the possibility of a resurrected Iranian nation doesn't seem so absent anymore.
We have heard rumours of islands out in the West Atlantic that could serve as a base for future exploration opportunities. Let us send ships out to investigate this.
A shipwrecked sailor brought back news of an archipelago in the seas to the south of Iberia. Let us send ships south to investigate this.
Our explorers believe that Africa extends but a short way further south and soon we will be able to swing round and find a trade route to the Red Sea.
The Winds and currents favour Westward expansion. Our explorers believe that rich lands lie just over the Horizon.
The Muslim conquest of the Spaniards has succeeded! As the Muslim world celebrates this victory new ideas are spreading across the Mediterranean. This could mark the beginning of a new golden age.

We have united the peninsula under one banner and are committed to forging a bright future. We must show our people and the entire world that innovation and imperialism are not solely the domain of infidels.
The Arab people have united the entire peninsula under one banner. They stand on the brink of greatness and we could learn much from their example.

Once again the faithful followers of Islam have taken on the mantle of leaders of the world. Our cultural ideas and scientific achievements are the envy of all. What we do with this incredible opportunity is now up to us.
Sardinia was claimed by the Chrisian Iberians as their own. Now that we have taken on their other burdens, why shouldn't we also claim their rights of conquest?
Southern Italy was once part of the Muslim community. The children of God there have become lost and disillusioned. We have the power to once again show them the light.
We have returned from the brink of destruction, and brought enlightenment back to the Spaniards. May our rule bring about another Golden Age of Islam!
Our people have been sent into hiding by the Spaniards but now that we have returned to power they can show their true selves once more.
We have returned to glory from the brink of destruction. The Iberians are still powerful though, and we could learn a few things from their barbaric ways.
Our spiritual allies in Granada are in a dire position. The Spaniards are threatening to push them back across the Mediterranean. We can send them supplies if you feel the cause is worthy.
The Reconquista threatens to destroy us, but we are not in this fight alone. Muslims from around the Mediterranean are sending their prayers, and their money.

Violent rebels in Samarkand have foolishly destroyed one of the most valuable astronomical tools in the world. Their lack of respect for science is a loss for us all. The Samarkand Observatory lies broken and scattered.
The people of Sicily are not following the true faith. We must show them the error of their ways.

The Islamic world was once the center of scientific discovery and human progress. Now our greatest thinkers have been chained by fundamentalism and suspicion. Finding a synthesis between scientific and religious thought will ensure a place for Islam in the modern world.
Striving for harmony between scientific and religious teachings.

$MONARCH$ is not only a great ruler but an accomplished astronomer as well. The patronage of Islam's greatest thinkers along with the construction of a great observatory will grant us great insight into the truths of this world and beyond.
Our nation benefits greatly from access to the most powerful astronomical tool in the known world.
Our nation keeps a close watch over the holiest of cities, the meeting place of Judaism, Christianity and Islam.

Once again the crowns of Samaria and Judah have been united and the land of Israel is reborn. Her children now once more have a land to call their own, following in the footsteps of David and Solomon.

Once again the crowns of Samaria and Judah have been united and the land of Israel is reborn. Her children now once more have a land to call their own, following in the footsteps of David and Solomon.

The flow of riches into the ports of Alexandria have allowed $MONARCH$ to bring great reforms to our nation. Spices from India and medicine from Europe have become commonplace in Egyptian markets, as has a growing class of traders and merchants. No longer a nation of slaves, the people of the Nile will never again bow to Turks or Bedouins.
